sentences.sContent: Celinda Lake, an opinion pollster in Washington DC who carries out work for the Democrats, has a thumbnail sketch of that swing female voter.
sentences.sContent_eng: Celinda Lake, an opinion pollster in Washington DC who carries out work for the Democrats, has a thumbnail sketch of that swing female voter.
sentences.sCn: 华盛顿的民意测验专家塞琳达·莱克为民主党工作。 她为立场摇摆不定的美国女性选民们勾勒了一幅速写图

remMethod.val: poll(民意调查) + st + er(人) → 民意调查员

trans.tranCn: 民意测验专家, 整理民意测验结果的人
trans.tranOther: someone who works for a company that prepares and asks questions to find out what people think about a particular subject
